mapper.select: SELECT so.* FROM `storage_output` so WHERE so.statistic_flag=0;

SELECT so.`customer_product_code`, p.`product_code`, p.`product_name`, p.`model` AS product_model, CASE p.`type` WHEN 0 THEN '原料' WHEN 1 THEN '半成品' WHEN 2 THEN '成品' ELSE '未定义' END AS product_type, CASE p.`product_unit` WHEN 0 THEN '片' WHEN 1 THEN '个' WHEN 2 THEN 'KG' ELSE '未定义' END AS product_unit, so.`order_no`, p.`total_amount`, so.`amount`, CASE so.`type` WHEN 0 THEN '生产出库' WHEN 1 THEN '销售出库' WHEN 2 THEN '退货出库' ELSE '未定义' END AS output_type, so.`create_time`, so.`update_time` FROM `storage_output` so LEFT JOIN `product_info` p ON p.`customer_product_code` = so.`customer_product_code` where 1=1 AND so.`customer_product_code` like CONCAT('%',#{customerProductCode},'%') AND so.`order_no` like CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%') AND so.`type`=#{type} AND so.`create_time` >= #{startTime} AND so.`create_time` <= #{endTime}
